page.title: 16SCHOOLS
page.content: There are 5 schools in the area. {ROMAN WAY PRIMARY SCHOOL } Roman way primary school was opened 1975.They have got 9 classroom in the school.They have got 2 playgrounds and 8 teachers.They got about 200 pupils.They have got 14 other people working in the school.They aim to make children happy and work hard. {SHEPERDS SPRING JUNIOR SCHOOL} Sheperds Spring Junior school was opened in 1967 they have got 8 classrooms in there school.Sheperds spring junior school have got 2 playgrounds and 2 football pitches. They have got 170 children in the school.They have got 5 teachers ,1 head and 14 other people working there.Sheperd spring is a very modern building and they have got lots of space.
